thread.title: William Smith
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by William Smith

author: William Smith
title: William Smith
text:
My taxes were done by a well known commercial tax outlet incorrectly in 2014 causing major debt and a financial burden with my family. Since 2014 taxes were done incorrectly the debt rolled over to my 2015 taxes. The Optima Team coordinated for me with the IRS ensuring tax years 2013, 2014 and 2015 were completed correctly and the tax debt payment was documented, received and closed by the IRS. Also I am eligible and will be utilizing the benefit of the Optima Tax Team to complete my 2016 taxes which is the ultimate Customer Service Satisfaction every tax payer should enjoy. The Optima Team is well deserving of a (5) star rating.
Will Smith
Spotsylvania County
Fredericksburg VA 22408
